name: Out of Time (itch) (NuggieGamezStudio)
description:
Out of Time is an action-adventure, two-dimensional platformer game. The story follows an inexperienced time guardian who failed at their job of protecting the world clock. Now they have to go on a journey to retrieve its stolen energy from rageful nature spirits and restore balance in the world.

This is not a finished game but a university project, that has been planned and produced within 2 months.
